name: Literally Two Worlds
description:
Is it a universe spiraling out of control? Is it a war between two worlds? We don't know! All you know that is you want to stay alive as long as you can! Select "GAME START" with X to start the game

Features:

  • Map wrapping! You and the planets wrap around the map!
  • Multi-colored worlds (unless you get unlucky and get 2 planets of the same color!)!
  • Sort-of-procedually-generated music!
  • Gravity! Get too close and the worlds will want to suck you in!
  • Planets slowly go faster and grow over time!
  • Experience the infinite void amidst the countless stars of space!
  • And finally, there's literally two worlds in the game!
